actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archer bush makes two attacks with its thorns.

actions.name: Thorns
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bloodsuck
actions.desc: A creature within 5 ft. of the archer bush that has 0 hit points is drained of blood. The creature automatically fails a death saving throw.
